title: You know Riot, fuck you.
body:
You preach and preach about how much you care, how much effort you put into your game, all that... yet EVERYTHING YOU DO shows the opposite.

Really is fun when I can look at the champs and know which team is going to automatically win. Even against TERRIBLE players who would feed under normal circumstances, I lose, because I don't enjoy playing the three champs per role that the whales approve of.

Oh, you're jungling? Well, if you're not playing Lee, Kha, Hec or Vi, you lose, guaranteed. Since they all clear faster, gank better and more often, and can build full tank and still one shot you.

Top? Well, you best be playing Jayce, Maokai or Ryze, or you lose.

Mid? If you're not Kat, Ori or Ryze (maybe Ahri), you're done for.

Bot lane? I hope you main Draven, Cait or Ez.

Support is the only role with more than 2-3 champs that are viable, but even then, you have a few power picks like Zyra, Brand and Malz.
...

I just don't get how anyone can believe Riot gives a fuck outside of money. There are maybe 3-4 champs per role you can play and be worth anything, and half of those champs just automatically win unless they're beyond garbage players. Balance isn't a thing, and when a champion is legitimately broken, Riot spends four months fixing them if they do at all -- but, you know, that's putting the quality of your game before income potential.

replies.body:
They just nerfed Vi, your post was just invalidated because you said EVERYTHING.

Not to mention they just made a new gamemode and provided the champs for free.
They nerfed Vi? Really? What'd they do, take 10 damage off her Q?

Actually they nerfed her Movement speed and lowered her base attack speed.

Your cynical sarcasm has been noted however.

So, instead of nerfing her actual issues, like the 4s CD on her Q, the absurd damage on her E, and her ult with a 45s CD... they nerf her MS and base AS. Okay.

Now, remind me how that solves the issue.
Easy. She can't chase you down with lowered MS. Plain and simple.

I don't understand how you can keep going on about how balance is bad because all Riot cares about is money and how they make it so you have to buy expensive champs to win when the champions you name are old ones that people already bought and even permanently discounted  and one of the current best top laners is for, all purposes, completely free.
